abstract: The global miner Rio Tinto will not rule out raising capital to maintain its A credit rating as it prepares to spend $38.1 billion to take over the Canadian aluminum producer Alcan, its chief executive, Tom Albanese, said on Friday.
lead_paragraph: The global miner Rio Tinto will not rule out raising capital to maintain its A credit rating as it prepares to spend $38.1 billion to take over the Canadian aluminum producer Alcan, its chief executive, Tom Albanese, said on Friday.

headline.main: With Alcan Takeover Near, Rio Tinto Considers Asset Sales
